title: What kind of energy is the soul? - Quora

response.answer_text: soul is impersonal consciousness, light ,love,truth. Is the energy that fills the big reality ,dozens of differents vibrations/dimensions from very material till very spiritual. Is a energy full of potentialities that create bodies with certain capabilities to become more self-conscient. What behind is the creative force is the big mystery…
QUESTION: What kind of energy is the soul? ANSWER: Imaginary. You’ve heard of imaginary numbers? Well soul is imaginary energy. One of those is useful.

its a mystery, take for instance spirit told researchers, that they mix the energy of the sitters, the energy of the spirit, and the energy present in the earth, when all is mixed together, then and only then can they perform what we would term the impossible.
